body:
>I don't understand how adding those directories to .gitignore will help.

You are correct, there are two issues here. I guess you never intend to check the build artifacts into Git. As to the second -- maybe clean the build output before building? I notice there is a `clean.bash`, but that depends on `../bin/go`...

>What is the failure from all.base?
